Text: It's free, why they sell it? Before they decide to give it as a gift was it on sale? I cam d/l from Abandonia legally.
It is free...they aren' trying to sell it.  Other classic PC games on GOG.com are for sale but this game was free as a holiday gift.
Motley... Stop trying to be Buzz Killington and just enjoy the game. And thanks again Danger... I'll seed this one to 500% also!
